name: RoverBot Starter Kit
description: Your first step into robotics! Build a simple wheeled robot with remote control and basic IR obstacle avoidance. Perfect for beginners.

name: All-Terrain Explorer Bot
description: A robust 4-wheel drive bot with upgraded motors and ultrasonic sensor for navigating tougher indoor terrain. Introduces block coding via app.

name: SwiftLine Follower Bot
description: Build a fast bot designed to follow black lines using IR sensors. Introduces PID control concepts via block coding and app challenges.

name: Tank Treads Bot
description: Assemble a powerful tracked robot capable of climbing small obstacles. Features dual motors for skid steering and a block coding interface.

name: Arctic Explorer TrackBot
description: Themed tracked bot with enhanced sensors (temperature, light) and optional Python API access for complex programmable missions.

name: QuadruPed Walker Kit
description: Build a simple four-legged walking robot using servo motors. Learn basic gait mechanics via block coding and app control.

name: HexaBot Explorer
description: A six-legged walker with multiple servo motors for lifelike movement. Includes ultrasonic sensor for navigation and block/Python coding.

name: HexaBot Sentry
description: Advanced hexapod featuring an onboard camera module, Wi-Fi connectivity, app control with FPV, and basic AI routines (patrolling) programmable via Python.

name: ArachnoBot Builder
description: A complex kit to build an 8-legged walking robot resembling a spider. Features multiple servo motors, ultrasonic sensor, Bluetooth control, and block-based + Python programming.

name: Mini ArachnoBot
description: A smaller, simpler 8-legged spider bot. Focuses on assembly technique and basic walking patterns controlled via block code and app.

name: Grabber Arm Kit
description: Build a stationary robotic arm with 3 servo motors and a simple gripper mechanism. Controlled via companion app or block code.

name: Mobile Grabber Bot
description: Combines a wheeled robot base with the Grabber Arm Kit for fetching and carrying small objects. Programmable via block code or Python.

name: Industrial Arm Pro
description: High-precision 5-axis robotic arm kit for advanced users and hobbyists. Features durable metal gears and a Python API for complex sequences and inverse kinematics.

name: Sky Dart Drone Kit
description: Build your own basic quadcopter drone. Learn flight principles with a stable, easy-to-fly design using the included RC controller. Robust frame for beginners.

name: Vision Drone Explorer
description: Drone kit featuring an onboard camera, altitude hold, and app control with First Person View (FPV). Use block coding for simple autonomous flight paths.

name: Programmable Swarm Drone Pack (Set of 3)
description: Three smaller drones designed for synchronized flight patterns. Program complex aerial formations and interactions via a central Python interface. Ideal for educators or advanced hobbyists.

name: KinetiBot Prime
description: Our flagship humanoid robot kit. A complex build featuring numerous servo motors for walking, balancing, and gesturing. Programmable via advanced block coding and Python.

name: BattleBot Arena Starter Set (2 Bots)
description: Build two customizable wheeled battle bots with simple weapon attachments (flippers/pushers). Control via IR remotes in the included mini arena.

name: Programmable BattleBot Pro
description: Design and build an advanced battle bot with servo-powered weapons. Program strategies using block code or Python via app control.

name: Robo-Pup Companion Bot
description: Build a friendly robotic dog that responds to touch sensors and simple voice commands (via app). Learn basic pet interactions with block coding.

name: BioMorph Insectoid Bot
description: Construct a unique insect-like robot with flapping wings or crawling legs. Explore biomimicry and program movement patterns with block code.

name: Sensor Expansion Pack
description: Add new capabilities to your ConstructoBots (Wheeled/Tracked series) with this pack including light, sound, and temperature sensors.

name: Advanced Servo Pack (4 Servos)
description: Upgrade your legged bots or robotic arms with four additional high-torque servos for more complex movements and designs.

name: Classroom RoverBot Bundle (Set of 5)
description: A pack of 5 RoverBot Starter Kits plus educator guide with lesson plans focused on basic robotics and assembly.

name: Coding Explorer Classroom Pack (Set of 5)
description: Includes 5 All-Terrain Explorer Bots (CB-WHL-002) and an enhanced educator guide covering block coding fundamentals and STEAM challenges.

name: Logic Gate Explorer Kit
description: Learn the fundamentals of digital logic! Snap together blocks representing AND, OR, NOT gates, power, inputs (buttons), and outputs (LEDs).

name: Circuit City Logic Lab
description: Modular electronics kit teaching logic gates (AND, OR, NOT, XOR), inputs (buttons, light sensors), and outputs (LEDs, buzzers). Connects to PC software for simulation.

name: Advanced Logic Systems Kit
description: Explore more complex digital circuits including flip-flops, counters, and registers using modular blocks. PC software includes advanced challenges.

name: MicroController Starter Kit (KinetiCore Uno)
description: Beginner-friendly introduction to microcontrollers based on Arduino principles. Includes KinetiCore Uno board, breadboard, wires, LEDs, buttons, and sensors. Uses block coding.

name: IoT Explorer Kit (KinetiCore ESP)
description: Explore the Internet of Things! Kit based on an ESP32-variant microcontroller with built-in Wi-Fi/Bluetooth. Connect projects to the cloud. Block coding and MicroPython support.

name: Compute Hub Kit (KinetiCore Pi)
description: A simplified Raspberry Pi-based kit for learning computing fundamentals, Linux, and Python programming alongside electronics projects.

name: Environmental Sensor Pack
description: Expansion pack for MicroController Kits. Includes sensors for temperature, humidity, air pressure, and gas detection.

name: Motion & Sound Sensor Pack
description: Expansion pack for MicroController Kits. Includes PIR motion sensor, accelerometer/gyroscope, microphone, and ultrasonic distance sensor.

name: Weather Station Builder Kit
description: Build a functional mini weather station using a KinetiCore microcontroller and environmental sensors. Display data locally or send it online (requires IoT Kit or Compute Hub).

name: Home Automation Lab
description: Learn the basics of smart home technology. Use a microcontroller kit (sold separately) to control lights, fans (low power), and read sensors via app or web interface.

name: Breadboard Basics Kit
description: A simple introduction to breadboarding electronic circuits. Includes breadboard, jumper wires, battery pack, LEDs, resistors, and buttons. No programming needed.

name: Component Cornucopia Pack
description: A large assortment of electronic components for breadboarding experiments - various resistors, capacitors, transistors, ICs (timers, op-amps), sensors, LEDs, buzzers.

name: Logic Lab Classroom Set (Set of 5)
description: Contains 5 Circuit City Logic Lab kits (LL-CIR-005) and an educator guide with lesson plans on digital logic and simulation.

name: MicroController Innovator Pack (Set of 5)
description: Includes 5 MicroController Starter Kits (LL-MCU-001) and an educator guide for teaching block-based coding and electronics.

name: Lunar Base Alpha AR Playset
description: Build a modular moon base. Use the companion app to bring it to life with AR missions, astronaut figures (RFID enabled), and interactive elements.

name: Star Station Odyssey AR Playset
description: Build a large, detailed space station model. Included figures (astronauts/aliens) have RFID bases triggering AR events, missions, and character interactions in the app.

name: Mars Rover Expedition Set
description: Construct a detailed Mars rover model and a small habitat section. AR app features driving missions, sample collection mini-games, and scientific facts.

name: Castle Knights Kingdom AR Playset
description: Build a medieval castle with towers and walls. Knight and dragon figures (RFID) unlock quests, battles, and story moments in the AR companion app.

name: Enchanted Forest Grove Playset
description: Construct a magical forest scene with interactive trees and glowing elements. Fairy and gnome figures (RFID) trigger nature-based AR puzzles and mini-games.

name: Kinetic City Downtown AR Playset
description: Build a bustling city block with shops and vehicles. Community helper figures (RFID) unlock AR scenarios teaching about different professions and city life.

name: Emergency Response HQ Playset
description: Construct a fire station and police station hub. Firefighter and police officer figures (RFID) activate emergency mission AR simulations in the city.

name: Dino Dig Site AR Playset
description: Build a prehistoric excavation site. Paleontologist and dinosaur figures (RFID/AR markers) unlock fossil digging mini-games and AR dinosaurs that roam the playset.

name: Volcano Valley Adventure Playset
description: Construct a landscape featuring a light-up volcano. AR app triggers 'eruption' effects and challenges involving navigating dinosaurs away from danger.

name: Space Explorer Figure Pack (3 Figures)
description: Add three new astronaut/alien figures with unique RFID tags to expand your Space Exploration playsets and unlock new AR content.

name: Fantasy Creatures Pack (3 Figures)
description: Expand your Castle Knights Kingdom or Enchanted Forest playsets with three new fantasy creatures (e.g., griffin, wizard, troll) with RFID tags for new AR interactions.

name: City Vehicles Pack (3 Vehicles)
description: Add a construction truck, sports car, and delivery van to your Kinetic City playsets. Vehicles feature AR markers recognized by the app.

name: AR Storytelling Classroom Kit (City Theme)
description: Bundle including 3 Kinetic City Downtown Playsets, extra figures, and an educator guide focusing on using AR for collaborative storytelling and social studies.

name: Marble Run Starter Set
description: An introductory kit to build exciting marble runs. Includes basic tracks, curves, and structural elements. Focus on gravity and simple mechanics.

name: Marble Vortex Challenge
description: Medium-sized marble run kit featuring vortex funnels, track switches, and a hand-cranked marble lift. Introduces more complex pathing.

name: Marble Metropolis Mega Run
description: A vast, intricate marble run kit involving thousands of pieces, multiple motorized lifts, electronic gates triggered by marbles, loops, and complex track switching.

name: Gear Revolution Kit
description: Explore the power of gears! Build various mechanisms like gearboxes, crank sliders, and rack-and-pinion systems to understand mechanical advantage and motion transfer.

name: Motorized Gear Master Set
description: Advanced gear kit including a motor pack. Build complex, powered contraptions like automata, walkers, or lifting mechanisms driven by intricate gear trains.

name: Chain Reaction Creator Kit
description: Design and build amazing chain reactions! Kit includes ramps, dominoes, levers, pulleys, balls, and unique triggers to spark creativity.

name: Kinetic Contraption Challenge
description: An advanced chain reaction kit with more complex parts, including spring launchers, magnetic releases, electronic triggers (light/sound activated), and motorized elements.

name: Pneumatic Power Lab
description: Explore the principles of pneumatics. Build models like lifting platforms, robotic grippers, or vehicle suspension using air pressure cylinders and hand pumps.

name: Hydraulic Machines Kit
description: Discover hydraulics using water-filled syringes and tubing. Construct functional models like small cranes, bridges, or presses to demonstrate fluid power.

name: Marble Run Motor & Sensor Pack
description: Upgrade your KinetiKits marble runs with a motor pack for lifts and electronic gate/sensor modules triggered by marbles.

name: Advanced Structures Pack
description: Add complex structural elements, connectors, and base plates to build larger and more intricate KinetiKits constructions.

name: Simple Machines Classroom Set (Gears/Levers)
description: Bundle of parts equivalent to 4 Gear Revolution Kits (KK-GR-001) plus lever components, designed for classroom exploration of simple machines. Includes educator guide.

name: AniMate Junior Tablet
description: A durable drawing tablet with a simplified stylus and dedicated software for creating frame-by-frame animations. Includes libraries and easy export.

name: AniMate Pro Tablet
description: Advanced animation tablet with pressure-sensitive stylus, higher resolution screen, layer support, and more sophisticated software tools. Exports in various formats.

name: ProtoPen 3D Printing Pen
description: A safe, kid-friendly 3D pen using low-temperature, non-toxic filament. Draw objects in mid-air or trace templates. Great for spatial reasoning.

name: MiniForge 3D Printer
description: An easy-to-use, enclosed mini 3D printer designed for kids and beginners. Uses safe PLA filament and simplified slicing software.

name: BeatBuilder Music Station
description: A simple hardware interface with pads and knobs connected to software for creating beats and loops. Includes sound libraries and basic effects.

name: SoundScape Mixer Console
description: A more advanced kid-friendly mixing console with multiple channels, basic EQ, effects, and microphone input. Connects to PC/tablet software.

name: StoryReel Video Editor Kit
description: A combination of a simple green screen, clip-on phone lens kit, and easy-to-use video editing app for creating fun short films and stop-motion.

name: ImagiGlow Story Projector
description: A projector that uses interchangeable discs and connects to an app to tell interactive stories with light, sound effects, and simple choices.

name: ProtoPen Filament Refill Pack (Multi-Color)
description: Refill pack of 10 different colors of safe, low-temperature filament for the ProtoPen 3D Printing Pen.

name: MiniForge PLA Filament Spool (Single Color)
description: Standard size PLA filament spool (various single colors available) for the MiniForge 3D Printer.
